import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; const Toast = Swal.mixin({ toast: true, position: 'top-end', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 1000, timerProgressBar: true, didOpen: (toast) => { toast.addEventListener('mouseenter', Swal.stopTimer) toast.addEventListener('mouseleave', Swal.resumeTimer) } }) const Myprofile = (props) => { const handleClick = () => { Toast.fire({ icon: 'success', title: 'Logged out successfully' }) } return (

) } export default Myprofile
